verses.verse: וּבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> u-ve-Nei Now the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֣ל׀ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel לְֽמִסְפָּרָ֡ם <S%H4557><s%> le-mis-pa-Ram after their number רָאשֵׁ֣י <S%H7218><s%> ra-Shei [to wit] the chief הָאָב֣וֹת <S%H1><s%> ha-'a-Vot fathers וְשָׂרֵ֣י <S%H8269><s%> ve-sa-Rei and captains הָֽאֲלָפִ֣ים׀ <S%H505><s%> ha-'a-la-Fim of thousands וְהַמֵּא֡וֹת <S%H3967><s%> ve-ham-me-'ot and hundreds וְשֹׁטְרֵיהֶם֩ <S%H7860><s%> ve-sho-te-rei-Hem and their officers הַמְשָׁרְתִ֨ים <S%H8334><s%> ham-sha-re-Tim that served אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַמֶּ֜לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> ham-Me-lech the king לְכֹ֣ל׀ <S%H3605><s%> le-Chol any דְּבַ֣ר <S%H1697><s%> de-Var in any matter הַֽמַּחְלְק֗וֹת <S%H4256><s%> ham-mach-le-Kot, of the courses הַבָּאָ֤ה <S%H935><s%> hab-ba-'Ah which came in וְהַיֹּצֵאת֙ <S%H3318><s%> ve-hai-yo-tzeT and went out חֹ֣דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> Cho-desh month בְּחֹ֔דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> be-Cho-desh, by month לְכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> le-Chol all חָדְשֵׁ֣י <S%H2320><s%> cha-de-Shei throughout all the months הַשָּׁנָ֑ה <S%H8141><s%> hash-sha-Nah; of the year הַֽמַּחֲלֹ֙קֶת֙ <S%H4256><s%> ham-ma-cha-Lo-ket course הָֽאַחַ֔ת <S%H259><s%> ha-'a-Chat, of every עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <S%H6242><s%> 'es-Rim [were] twenty וְאַרְבָּעָ֖ה <S%H702><s%> ve-'ar-ba-'Ah and four אָֽלֶף׃ <S%H505><s%> 'A-lef. thousand ס sa-Mek

עַ֞ל <S%H5921><s%> 'al and הַמַּחֲלֹ֤קֶת <S%H4256><s%> ham-ma-cha-Lo-ket course הָרִֽאשׁוֹנָה֙ <S%H7223><s%> ha-ri-sho-Nah Over the first לַחֹ֣דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> la-Cho-desh month הָרִאשׁ֔וֹן <S%H7223><s%> ha-ri-Shon, for the first יָֽשָׁבְעָ֖ם <S%H3434><s%> ya-sha-ve-'Am [was] Jashobeam בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son זַבְדִּיאֵ֑ל <S%H2068><s%> zav-di-'El; of Zabdiel וְעַל֙ <S%H5921><s%> ve-'Al and in מַֽחֲלֻקְתּ֔וֹ <S%H4256><s%> ma-cha-luk-To, and in his course עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <S%H6242><s%> 'es-Rim [were] twenty וְאַרְבָּעָ֖ה <S%H702><s%> ve-'ar-ba-'Ah and four אָֽלֶף׃ <S%H505><s%> 'A-lef. thousand

מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- at בְּנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> be-nei- Of the children פֶ֗רֶץ <S%H6557><s%> Fe-retz, of Perez הָרֹ֛אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> ha-Rosh [was] the chief לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> le-chol of all שָׂרֵ֥י <S%H8269><s%> sa-Rei of all the captains הַצְּבָא֖וֹת <S%H6635><s%> hatz-tze-va-'ot of the host לַחֹ֥דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> la-Cho-desh month הָרִאשֽׁוֹן׃ <S%H7223><s%> ha-ri-Shon. for the first

וְעַ֞ל <S%H5921><s%> ve-'Al and over מַחֲלֹ֣קֶת׀ <S%H4256><s%> ma-cha-Lo-ket And over the course הַחֹ֣דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> ha-Cho-desh month הַשֵּׁנִ֗י <S%H8145><s%> hash-she-Ni, of the second דּוֹדַ֤י <S%H1737><s%> do-Dai [was] Dodai הָאֲחוֹחִי֙ <S%H266><s%> ha-'a-cho-Chi an Ahohite וּמַ֣חֲלֻקְתּ֔וֹ <S%H4256><s%> u-Ma-cha-luk-To, and of his course וּמִקְל֖וֹת <S%H4732><s%> u-mik-Lot [was] Mikloth הַנָּגִ֑יד <S%H5057><s%> han-na-Gid; also the ruler וְעַל֙ <S%H5921><s%> ve-'Al in מַחֲלֻקְתּ֔וֹ <S%H4256><s%> ma-cha-luk-To, in his course עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <S%H6242><s%> 'es-Rim likewise [were] twenty וְאַרְבָּעָ֖ה <S%H702><s%> ve-'ar-ba-'Ah and four אָֽלֶף׃ <S%H505><s%> 'A-lef. thousand ס sa-Mek

שַׂ֣ר <S%H8269><s%> sar captain הַצָּבָ֤א <S%H6635><s%> hatz-tza-Va of the host הַשְּׁלִישִׁי֙ <S%H7992><s%> hash-she-li-Shi The third לַחֹ֣דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> la-Cho-desh month הַשְּׁלִישִׁ֔י <S%H7992><s%> hash-she-li-Shi, for the third בְּנָיָ֧הוּ <S%H1141><s%> be-na-Ya-hu [was] Benaiah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> ven- the son יְהוֹיָדָ֛ע <S%H3077><s%> ye-ho-ya-Da' of Jehoiada הַכֹּהֵ֖ן <S%H3548><s%> hak-ko-Hen priest רֹ֑אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> Rosh; a chief וְעַל֙ <S%H5921><s%> ve-'Al and in מַחֲלֻקְתּ֔וֹ <S%H4256><s%> ma-cha-luk-To, and in his course עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <S%H6242><s%> 'es-Rim [were] twenty וְאַרְבָּעָ֖ה <S%H702><s%> ve-'ar-ba-'Ah and four אָֽלֶף׃ <S%H505><s%> 'A-lef. thousand

ה֧וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu This בְנָיָ֛הוּ <S%H1141><s%> ve-na-Ya-hu This [is that] Benaiah גִּבּ֥וֹר <S%H1368><s%> gib-Bor [who was] mighty הַשְּׁלֹשִׁ֖ים <S%H7970><s%> hash-she-lo-Shim [among] the thirty וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> ve-'al- charge הַשְּׁלֹשִׁ֑ים <S%H7970><s%> hash-she-lo-Shim; and above the thirty וּמַ֣חֲלֻקְתּ֔וֹ <S%H4256><s%> u-Ma-cha-luk-To, and in his course עַמִּיזָבָ֖ד <S%H5990><s%> 'am-mi-za-Vad [was] Ammizabad בְּנֽוֹ׃ <S%H1121><s%> be-No. his son ס sa-Mek

הָֽרְבִיעִ֞י <S%H7243><s%> ha-re-vi-'I The fourth לַחֹ֣דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> la-Cho-desh month הָרְבִיעִ֗י <S%H7243><s%> ha-re-vi-'I, [captain] for the fourth עֲשָׂה־ 'a-sah- אֵל֙ <S%H6214><s%> 'el [was] Asahel אֲחִ֣י <S%H251><s%> 'a-Chi the brother יוֹאָ֔ב <S%H3097><s%> yo-'Av, of Joab וּזְבַדְיָ֥ה <S%H2069><s%> u-ze-vad-Yah and Zebadiah בְנ֖וֹ <S%H1121><s%> ve-No his son אַחֲרָ֑יו <S%H310><s%> 'a-cha-Rav; after וְעַל֙ <S%H5921><s%> ve-'Al and in מַחֲלֻקְתּ֔וֹ <S%H4256><s%> ma-cha-luk-To, him and in his course עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <S%H6242><s%> 'es-Rim [were] twenty וְאַרְבָּעָ֖ה <S%H702><s%> ve-'ar-ba-'Ah and four אָֽלֶף׃ <S%H505><s%> 'A-lef. thousand ס sa-Mek

הַחַמִישִׁי֙ <S%H2549><s%> ha-cha-mi-Shi The fifth לַחֹ֣דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> la-Cho-desh month הַחֲמִישִׁ֔י <S%H2549><s%> ha-cha-mi-Shi, for the fifth הַשַּׂ֖ר <S%H8269><s%> has-Sar captain שַׁמְה֣וּת <S%H8049><s%> sham-Hut [was] Shamhuth הַיִּזְרָ֑ח <S%H3155><s%> hai-yiz-Rach; the Izrahite וְעַל֙ <S%H5921><s%> ve-'Al and in מַחֲלֻקְתּ֔וֹ <S%H4256><s%> ma-cha-luk-To, and in his course עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <S%H6242><s%> 'es-Rim [were] twenty וְאַרְבָּעָ֖ה <S%H702><s%> ve-'ar-ba-'Ah and four אָֽלֶף׃ <S%H505><s%> 'A-lef. thousand ס sa-Mek

הַשִּׁשִּׁי֙ <S%H8345><s%> hash-shish-Shi The sixth לַחֹ֣דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> la-Cho-desh month הַשִּׁשִּׁ֔י <S%H8345><s%> hash-shish-Shi, [captain] for the sixth עִירָ֥א <S%H5896><s%> 'i-Ra [was] Ira בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> ven- the son עִקֵּ֖שׁ <S%H6142><s%> 'ik-Kesh of Ikkesh הַתְּקוֹעִ֑י <S%H8621><s%> hat-te-ko-'I; the Tekoite וְעַל֙ <S%H5921><s%> ve-'Al and in מַחֲלֻקְתּ֔וֹ <S%H4256><s%> ma-cha-luk-To, and in his course עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <S%H6242><s%> 'es-Rim [were] twenty וְאַרְבָּעָ֖ה <S%H702><s%> ve-'ar-ba-'Ah and four אָֽלֶף׃ <S%H505><s%> 'A-lef. thousand ס sa-Mek

הַשְּׁבִיעִי֙ <S%H7637><s%> hash-she-vi-'I The seventh לַחֹ֣דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> la-Cho-desh month הַשְּׁבִיעִ֔י <S%H7637><s%> hash-she-vi-'I, [captain] for the seventh חֶ֥לֶץ <S%H2503><s%> Che-letz [was] Helez הַפְּלוֹנִ֖י <S%H6397><s%> hap-pe-lo-Ni the Pelonite מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- at בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei of the children אֶפְרָ֑יִם <S%H669><s%> 'ef-Ra-yim; of Ephraim וְעַל֙ <S%H5921><s%> ve-'Al and in מַחֲלֻקְתּ֔וֹ <S%H4256><s%> ma-cha-luk-To, and in his course עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <S%H6242><s%> 'es-Rim [were] twenty וְאַרְבָּעָ֖ה <S%H702><s%> ve-'ar-ba-'Ah and four אָֽלֶף׃ <S%H505><s%> 'A-lef. thousand ס sa-Mek

הַשְּׁמִינִי֙ <S%H8066><s%> hash-she-mi-Ni The eighth לַחֹ֣דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> la-Cho-desh month הַשְּׁמִינִ֔י <S%H8066><s%> hash-she-mi-Ni, [captain] for the eighth סִבְּכַ֥י <S%H5444><s%> sib-be-Chai [was] Sibbecai הַחֻשָׁתִ֖י <S%H2843><s%> ha-chu-sha-Ti the Hushathite לַזַּרְחִ֑י <S%H2227><s%> laz-zar-Chi; of the Zarhites וְעַל֙ <S%H5921><s%> ve-'Al and in מַחֲלֻקְתּ֔וֹ <S%H4256><s%> ma-cha-luk-To, and in his course עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <S%H6242><s%> 'es-Rim [were] twenty וְאַרְבָּעָ֖ה <S%H702><s%> ve-'ar-ba-'Ah and four אָֽלֶף׃ <S%H505><s%> 'A-lef. thousand ס sa-Mek

הַתְּשִׁיעִי֙ <S%H8671><s%> hat-te-shi-'I The ninth לַחֹ֣דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> la-Cho-desh month הַתְּשִׁיעִ֔י <S%H8671><s%> hat-te-shi-'I, [captain] for the ninth אֲבִיעֶ֥זֶר <S%H44><s%> 'a-vi-'E-zer [was] Abiezer הָעַנְּתֹתִ֖י <S%H6069><s%> ha-'an-ne-to-Ti the Anetothite; לַבֶּנְיְמִינִי lab-ben-ye-mi-ni כלַבֵּ֣ן lab-Ben ק; יְמִינִ֑י <S%H1145><s%> ye-mi-Ni; Benjamite קוְעַל֙ <S%H5921><s%> ve-'Al and in מַחֲלֻקְתּ֔וֹ <S%H4256><s%> ma-cha-luk-To, and in his course עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <S%H6242><s%> 'es-Rim [were] twenty וְאַרְבָּעָ֖ה <S%H702><s%> ve-'ar-ba-'Ah and four אָֽלֶף׃ <S%H505><s%> 'A-lef. thousand ס sa-Mek

הָעֲשִׂירִי֙ <S%H6224><s%> ha-'a-si-Ri The tenth לַחֹ֣דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> la-Cho-desh month הָעֲשִׂירִ֔י <S%H6224><s%> ha-'a-si-Ri, [captain] for the tenth מַהְרַ֥י <S%H4121><s%> mah-Rai [was] Maharai הַנְּטֽוֹפָתִ֖י <S%H5200><s%> han-ne-to-fa-Ti the Netophathite לַזַּרְחִ֑י <S%H2227><s%> laz-zar-Chi; of the Zarhites וְעַל֙ <S%H5921><s%> ve-'Al and in מַֽחֲלֻקְתּ֔וֹ <S%H4256><s%> ma-cha-luk-To, and in his course עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <S%H6242><s%> 'es-Rim [were] twenty וְאַרְבָּעָ֖ה <S%H702><s%> ve-'ar-ba-'Ah and four אָֽלֶף׃ <S%H505><s%> 'A-lef. thousand ס sa-Mek

עַשְׁתֵּֽי־ <S%H6249><s%> 'ash-tei- eleven עָשָׂר֙ <S%H6240><s%> 'a-Sar ten לְעַשְׁתֵּ֣י־ <S%H6249><s%> le-'ash-Tei- eleven עָשָׂ֣ר <S%H6240><s%> 'a-Sar ten הַחֹ֔דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> ha-Cho-desh, month בְּנָיָ֥ה <S%H1141><s%> be-na-Yah [was] Benaiah הַפִּרְעָתוֹנִ֖י <S%H6553><s%> hap-pir-'a-to-Ni the Pirathonite מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- at בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei of the children אֶפְרָ֑יִם <S%H669><s%> 'ef-Ra-yim; of Ephraim וְעַל֙ <S%H5921><s%> ve-'Al and in מַחֲלֻקְתּ֔וֹ <S%H4256><s%> ma-cha-luk-To, and in his course עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <S%H6242><s%> 'es-Rim [were] twenty וְאַרְבָּעָ֖ה <S%H702><s%> ve-'ar-ba-'Ah and four אָֽלֶף׃ <S%H505><s%> 'A-lef. thousand ס sa-Mek

הַשְּׁנֵ֤ים <S%H8147><s%> hash-she-Neim both עָשָׂר֙ <S%H6240><s%> 'a-Sar ten לִשְׁנֵ֣ים <S%H8147><s%> lish-Neim both עָשָׂ֣ר <S%H6240><s%> 'a-Sar ten הַחֹ֔דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> ha-Cho-desh, month חֶלְדַּ֥י <S%H2469><s%> chel-Dai [was] Heldai הַנְּטוֹפָתִ֖י <S%H5200><s%> han-ne-to-fa-Ti the Netophathite לְעָתְנִיאֵ֑ל <S%H6274><s%> le-'a-te-ni-'El; of Othniel וְעַל֙ <S%H5921><s%> ve-'Al and in מַחֲלֻקְתּ֔וֹ <S%H4256><s%> ma-cha-luk-To, and in his course עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <S%H6242><s%> 'es-Rim [were] twenty וְאַרְבָּעָ֖ה <S%H702><s%> ve-'ar-ba-'Ah and four אָֽלֶף׃ <S%H505><s%> 'A-lef. thousand פ Peh

וְעַל֙ <S%H5921><s%> ve-'Al charge שִׁבְטֵ֣י <S%H7626><s%> shiv-Tei Furthermore over the tribes יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel לָרֽאוּבֵנִ֣י <S%H7206><s%> lo-r-'u-ve-Ni of the Reubenites נָגִ֔יד <S%H5057><s%> na-Gid, the ruler אֱלִיעֶ֖זֶר <S%H461><s%> 'e-li-'E-zer [was] Eliezer בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son זִכְרִ֑י <S%H2147><s%> zich-Ri; of Zichri ס sa-Mek לַשִּׁ֨מְעוֹנִ֔י <S%H8099><s%> lash-Shim-'o-Ni, of the Simeonites שְׁפַטְיָ֖הוּ <S%H8203><s%> she-fat-Ya-hu Shephatiah בֶּֽן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son מַעֲכָֽה׃ <S%H4601><s%> ma-'a-Chah. of Maachah ס sa-Mek

לְלֵוִ֛י <S%H3881><s%> le-le-Vi Of the Levites חֲשַׁבְיָ֥ה <S%H2811><s%> cha-shav-Yah Hashabiah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> ven- the son קְמוּאֵ֖ל <S%H7055><s%> ke-mu-'El of Kemuel לְאַהֲרֹ֥ן <S%H175><s%> le-'a-ha-Ron of the Aaronites צָדֽוֹק׃ <S%H6659><s%> tza-Dok. Zadok ס sa-Mek
